intro: Hi! My name is Simon and Iâ€™m a recently graduated software engineer based in Austin, TX. I love building solutions to complex problems, and I love learning as much as I can in the process. I am currently working as a Software Engineer at Amazon, where I work on building cloud-native, highly scalable software to improve safety for thousands of Amazon employees around the globe.

I recently graduated from UT Austin, where I had the opportunity to conduct research on a neural network compression model, teach the fundamentals of software to underclassmen, and work on some really cool projects ranging from reinforcement learning to web development. I also spent a summer at Amazon building a data pipeline and learning all about AWS.
I work on this website in my spare time, partly to showcase my work, but mostly to learn more about React, Docker, and all the cool things that they can do!
